post:
_This offer is a one time special and posted with LET staff's permission.  The offer over the price limit has been allowed as an exception._

#OVH in Asia-Pacific, 1-year Anniversary Deal on DEDICATED SERVERS:

* 50% off 12-month upfront payment. (25% off for 6 months. 15% off for 3 months)
* Discount is applied on the first upfront payment and for new services only (not recurring).
* Discount is valid for the base model of your chosen server, and is not applicable to optional upgrades.
* Offer expires when current stock is sold out
* Discount is applied at step 2 of the checkout process
* Offer applies to Dedicated Servers hosted in OVH **Sydney and Singapore datacenters** 


#Links to the offer 

Your are based in:

* AU/NZ (AUD): https://www.ovh.com.au/dedicated-servers/all_servers.xml?promo=true
* Southeast Asia (USD): https://www.ovh.com/asia/dedicated-servers/all_servers.xml?promo=true
* Singapore (SGD): https://www.ovh.com/sg/dedicated-servers/all_servers.xml?promo=true
* rest of the world:
  - USD: https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/all_servers.xml?promo=true&dc=sgp
  - EUR: https://www.ovh.ie/dedicated_servers/all_servers.xml?promo=true&dc=sgp
  - alternatively visit www.OVH.com to be redirected to your local/regional OVH website. 


#BASE MODELS FROM EACH RANGE:
_Prices below are indicated in USD_

**ENTERPRISE: SP-16-S** (regular price: $89.99 /month):

* 12-month upfront payment: equiv. to **$45 /month**
* 6-month upfront payment: equiv. to $67.49 /month
* 3-month upfront payment: equiv. to $76.49 /month
* Intel Xeon E3-1245v5
* 4c/8t - 3.5GHz /3.9GHz
* 16GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
* SoftRAID 2x2TB
* 250 Mbps bandwidth
* 3TB traffic (Unlimited optional) 


**HOSTING: HOST-64H** (regular price: $174.99 / month):

* 12-month upfront payment: equiv. to **$87.50 /month**
* 6-month upfront payment: equiv. to $131.24 /month
* 3-month upfront payment: equiv. to $148.74 /month
* Intel Xeon-D 1540
* 8c/16t - 2.1GHz /2.6GHz
* 64GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
* SoftRAID 2x2TB
* 250 Mbps bandwidth
* vRack private network: 100 Mbps
* 5TB traffic (Unlimited optional) 


**INFRASTRUCTURE: EG-32** (regular price: $159.99 / month):

* 12-month upfront payment: equiv. to **$80 /month**
* 6-month upfront payment: equiv. to $119.99 /month
* 3-month upfront payment: equiv. to $135.99 /month
* Intel Xeon E3-1270v6
* 4c/8t - 3.8GHz /4.2GHz
* 32GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
* SoftRAID 2x4TB
* 500 Mbps bandwidth
* vRack private network: 1 Gbps
* 5TB traffic (Unlimited optional) 


**GAMING: MC-32** (regular price: $129.99 / month):

* 12-month upfront payment: equiv. to **$65 /month**
* 6-month upfront payment: equiv. to $97.49 /month
* 3-month upfront payment: equiv. to $110.49 /month
* Intel i7-6700K
* 4c/8t - 4GHz /4.2GHz
* 32GB DDR4 2400 MHz
* SoftRAID 2x480GB SSD
* 250 Mbps bandwidth
* 3TB traffic (Unlimited optional)
* +Specific Game Anti DDOS protection included 


##Dedicated Server Benefit

* Delivered in 120s
* No setup fees
* Latest hardware
* Powerful anti-DDoS protection included
* Over 90 operating systems and licenses
* 1 IPv4 included (Up to 256 Ips. One off fee of $3/additional IP)
* /64 IPv6 included 


##Why buy a Dedicated Server?

* Manage a game server for your gaming community
* Host IO-intensive websites and applications
* Run a dedicated database server
* Host your own private virtualized environment 


##Test the OVH network performance

**Datacenter: Sydney, Australia:**

* Test IPv4 : 139.99.130.17
* Test IPv6 : 2402:1f00:8100:211::1
* Test files : http://syd.infrastructures.ovh/
* Test latency : http://syd.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
* Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
* Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac

**Datacenter: Singapore:**

* Test IPv4 : 139.99.8.97
* Test IPv6 : 2402:1f00:8000:261::1
* Test files : http://sgp.infrastructures.ovh/
* Test latency : http://sgp.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
* Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
* Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac

##About OVH

OVH is a global Cloud provider, offering innovative products and services with a focus on private, public and hybrid cloud, and bare metal (dedicated servers).

Founded in 1999, the OVH group manages and maintains 28 datacentres across 4 continents, deploys its own global fibre optic network, and has a full control over the supply chain (from server manufacturing and in-house maintenance of its infrastructure, right down to customer support). OVH offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector.
